home.title: Hi, I'ts Rocio Garcia Lofrano
home.subtitle: I'm Frontend Developer.
home.p: Living in Buenos Aires, Argentina. Welcome to my portfolio! ❤

about.p_1: I am a very creative person, especially in the technology field. I currently work as a frontend developer, creating attractive and intuitive interfaces for users to interact with web applications. Recently, I have started to delve into mobile development, exploring how to bring my design and programming skills to apps.
about.p_2: In addition to programming, I also enjoy creating 3D content. I was recently experimenting with 3D modeling and found it to be a unique and engaging way to bring my ideas to life. The creative process and the visual outcome were both fascinating to me.
about.p_3: In general, I am very passionate about design and have a good eye for it. I understand the principles of visual design and how to create pleasant user experiences. I like working in teams, collaborating with designers and other developers, but I am also very self-motivated and driven to learn on my own.

skills.skill_subtitle: Technologies and Frameworks I worked with
